Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.viewport.Camera
      • world.viewport.Player

  • public class Player
extends Camera
    The player, extension of camera for collisions.
    Author:
    Michael Ferolito

      • Player

        public Player(JoglPane jp)

        Parameters:

      • Player

        public Player(double w,
              double h,
              double d,
              double speed,
              double xSensitivity,
              double ySensitivity,
              double friction,
              double fov,
              double viewDistance,
              JoglPane jp)
        It would appear that the Player is not covered under the Server license, but the 3-clause BSD still applies.
        Parameters:
        w - Width of the player
        h - Height of the player
        d - Depth of the player
        speed - How fast the player moves
        xSensitivity - Mouse sensitivity on the x-axis
        ySensitivity - Mouse sensitivity on the y-axis
        friction - The amount of friction the player experiences while moving
        fov - The player's field of view
        viewDistance - How far the player can look in the distance

    • Method Detail

      • jump

        public void jump()
        Yeets the player into the air.

      • act

        public void act(java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Clippable> t)
        Checks to see if the player is colliding with any of the Block objects inside the specified ArrayList. Also checks ships. This is he thicckest method here.
        Parameters:
        chunks - ArrayList of Block objects to check collision with
